page.title: 10LEISURE IN HATHERLEY
page.content: There are few leisure facilities in Hatherley considering the number of young people in the area.{Caernarvon {Park}is a flat open space with a few swings and a roundabout,a large{riding {school}is nearby as is a{B.M.X. cycle {track.}There are also{Scout}and{Guide groups and a{Church youth section. Of a sample of Lakeside children about two thirds used the{park regularly,about a fifth used the{cycle {track}and a very small fraction the {riding school. We asked what extra items people would like in the area.A very large number wanted a{swimming pool, Cheltenham only has one indoor and one outdoor pool.Other requests were for more cycle tracks,better playground equipment,hard courts for tennis and netball,and a big sand pit!
